course.subject: CENG
course.name: Process Dynamics and Control
course.description: Basic concepts, mathematical model, transfer function. Dynamics of first - and higher-order systems. Feedback control, controller tuning, frequency response methods. Cascade control, feedforward and ratio control. Introduction to computer control and multi-variable control. Control and instrumentation hardware.
course.exclusions: ELEC 3200, MECH 3610

reviews.author: LMM
